__e: Ergo, no copy of any will being found, the estate descends to you... and your brother.
You can't speak ill of the dead because that would be speaking ill of the dead?
Bev made some good investments, believe it or not, We had money for you girls in his will, but.. we talked it over after some times passed and decided to change things, leave everything to me.
He showed up a few months ago, said Malcolm had gotten a job back East and wouldn't be coming back.
I just know that... he took his stuff... an said he wouldn't come back.
But then he told me that he wouldn't be back in town for a really long time, and then something inside of me just snapped, and I couldn't.
